author: _shemnon
content:
> no client on any supported platform will run out of real memory before it runs out of gas

No client hardware we expect to support.  A commodore 64 is not one we expect to support but validating a single transaction in a web browser on laptop in a developing country is one I expect we would want to do.  Maybe not validate and propagate a block, but validate their TX they saw on an L2.

author: gcolvin
content: Gotcha.  Do you have a notion of what we can do on those platforms now?
